content: I'm interested in pushing for stabilization of the feature iterator_fold_self, and I've (re)started a discussion on the issue (https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/68125). Is there a lib team member who'd be willing to look over the discussion, and perhaps kick-start any final decisions? The only real decision is the name, and it probably just needs someone to make an arbitrary decision :).
(You might have better luck in the t-libs stream. I didn't see a way to move a thread, but maybe as the thread starter you can.)
